text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ üß† SEO Lead üåç  Remote / Europe-first  üå± Pink Elephant ‚Äî Psychedelics √ó Digital Mental Health Venture Builder We are creating a portfolio of products and services that will provide access to the conscious and safe use of psychedelics for mental health and self-development, remove the social stigma surrounding psychedelics, and enable many people to approach this tool for personal growth in a safe and informed way. With growing cultural interest and policy shifts around psychedelics, we recognize that most experiences still happen outside clinics and therapists‚Äô cabinets in social or home settings, creating a significant gap between promoted media narratives and reality. We are driven to empower explorers throughout their entire journey of self-exploration and personal growth in the settings they prefer. Our mission is to provide reliable, accessible guidance to bridge this gap, helping people transform unsupervised use into mindful practice through education, community support, and practical tools for safer journeys. We are building the next unicorn in mental health. To reach the next 1 million monthly explorers, we need an SEO Lead who can turn search engines into our key acquisition channel. What You‚Äôll Be Doing Own the end-to-end SEO strategy: Map our 9-month path to 1M MAU: full-blown content engine vs iterative experiments, staging inflection points for each 10 √ó traffic jump. ¬† Ship a technically perfect site: Plan information architecture, core web vitals, schema, AI-readiness, multilingual tagging & CMS workflows. ¬† Build & expand the semantic universe: Create and continuously refine keyword clusters across Mental Health ‚Üí Psychedelics ‚Üí Product sub-niches; brief writers and designers with crystal-clear content specs. ¬† Link authority & E-E-A-T: Design white-hat off-page programmes (digital PR, thought-leadership, partnership domains, academic backlinks). ¬† Analytics & iteration loop: Wire GA4‚Äâ‚Üí‚ÄâGSC‚Äâ‚Üí‚ÄâLooker dashboards; track MAU, rankings, CTR to products, crawl errors; present insight ‚Üí next sprint every fortnight. ¬† 1st-Month Deliverables Build the first version of the website with all technical SEO considerations in place. Prepare technical briefs for the editorial team after compiling the initial keyword universe. Create content briefs for priority search queries. Define the keyword execution strategy. Draft a fast-track market-entry plan (e.g. acquiring aged domains and related assets). 3rd-Month Milestone ‚â• 13 000 MAU, with targeted % of sessions clicking through to our diagnostic funnel (TBC). ¬† KPIs You Own HorizonCore MetricsTargetsMonth 1Technical SEO readiness% of priority pages pass CWV, index & schema health checks (TBC)Month 2Early tractionFirst organic sessions & backlinks liveMonth 3Traffic & engagement‚â• 13 k MAUOngoingAcquisition efficiencyBlended CAC ‚â§ paid channels by month 6 (TBC) Must-Have Experience & Skills 5 + yrs devising and executing SEO optimization roadmaps for Western markets (US, UK, EU). Proven 0 ‚Üí 10 k MAU wins; portfolio of domains grown from scratch or post-migration turnarounds. Mastery of GSC, Ahrefs, SEMrush, Screaming Frog, Surfer/Frase or equivalents. Fluent in on-page, tech, and off-page SEO; solid grasp of HTML, CSS, common CMS (Webflow / WordPress / headless). Comprehensive understanding of ranking factors and how they affect a site‚Äôs visibility in the SERPs. Up-to-date on AI-powered SERP features and prompt-engineering content for them. Experiment-hungry, outcomes-obsessed, comfortable sparring with engineers and editors alike. ¬† Who You‚Äôll Partner With Content Studio ‚Äì editors, writers, designers (briefs ‚Üí publish cadence). Marketing & Growth ‚Äì CMO, paid-media, lifecycle (funnel analytics, CRO tests). Product & Engineering ‚Äì CTO, web dev squad (site perf, structured data, CMS). Leadership ‚Äì CEO & CMO co-decision makers on major bets (domain purchases, budget shifts). ¬† APPLY ‚Äã or https://‚Äã if you see the match!
requirements: ['5 + yrs devising and executing SEO optimization roadmaps for Western markets (US, UK, EU)', 'Proven 0 ‚Üí 10 k MAU wins', 'Mastery of GSC, Ahrefs, SEMrush, Screaming Frog, Surfer/Frase or equivalents', 'Fluent in on-page, tech, and off-page SEO', 'Solid grasp of HTML, CSS, common CMS (Webflow / WordPress / headless)', 'Comprehensive understanding of ranking factors and how they affect a site‚Äôs visibility in the SERPs', 'Up-to-date on AI-powered SERP features and prompt-engineering content for them', 'Experiment-hungry, outcomes-obsessed, comfortable sparring with engineers and editors alike']

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ About Termius: Termius is redefining how engineers interact with remote systems. Millions of engineers and thousands of companies rely on Termius worldwide. While AI has transformed modern IDEs, a terminal stays the same inefficient technology since the 1970s. As a leading cross-platform SSH client, our mission is to boost productivity and foster collaboration by rebuilding the Terminal for the modern era. We are actively growing and seeking a Senior iOS Engineer to join our team and help us make Termius the primary work instrument for many engineers worldwide in their daily routines. Why Join Termius: Your contributions will directly influence the experience of millions of engineers and shape the future of system management tools. The speed and quality of decision-making depend on the accessibility of information. We aim for full transparency in all our actions. We share and ask for the candid feedback needed to become great. We build for system engineers and aim to make complex things feel simple and visually appealing. Be part of a culture that values proactiveness, a fail-fast-learn-fast approach, and a strong sense of ownership. Requirements: At least 5-6 years of iOS engineering experience. Strong proficiency in  Swift,  memory management, and protocol-oriented programming. Expertise in building declarative UI, understanding view composition, state management, and  SwiftUI  lifecycle. Experience with working with  CoreData Proven ability to work independently and take full ownership of projects. Experience with automated testing frameworks and practices. Passion for product development and enhancing user experience. Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail. Excellent time management and organizational skills. Good communication skills in English (both written and verbal). Optional but welcomed skills: Knowledge of  Objective-C Experience with reactive programming,  RxSwift, and Combine . Experience with configuring  CI/CD pipelines. Knowledge of  SSH  protocol and experience with network engineering. Experience with  AWS . ¬† What you will do at Termius: Share responsibility for testing, releasing, and maintaining our desktop application and related developer tools and processes. Independently manage all stages of application development, shape requirements, and lead engineering projects relating to the desktop and web experiences. Proactively identify and resolve technical challenges to enhance application performance and user experience. Work closely with product managers, designers, and engineers to influence product development. Leverage technologies that bring value to our products and company, focusing on solutions that enhance functionality and meet our users' needs and product vision. Communicate with our users to understand their needs, troubleshoot issues, and ensure their success with our platform. What We Offer: We¬†provide¬†employees¬†with¬†the¬†necessary¬†equipment¬†to¬†create¬†a¬†productive¬†work¬†environment. Longevity¬†benefits:¬†paid¬†vacation,¬†sick¬†leaves,¬†and¬†flexible¬†timeoff. A¬†culture¬†that¬†encourages¬†proactiveness,¬†a¬†fail-fast-learn-fast¬†approach,¬†and¬†a¬†sense¬†of¬†ownership. Join Us: If you're an experienced self-sufficient individual contributor passionate about product development and excited to make a significant impact, we'd love to hear from you. Please submit your resume and cover letter detailing your experience and why you're a great fit for this role. You can apply directly through our Lever form using this link:  https://jobs.lever.co/Termius/bd91043d-4077-4fe8-ac84-9b77e65b22ed

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ Full-time, Senior/Middle+, Location: remotely, ¬±2 hours from EU timezone We are looking for a User Acquisition Manager (Social) who will fully own user acquisition strategy and execution across paid social channels. Your main focus will be driving new user growth and improving key performance metrics such as CPS, Gross Profit, and LTV / CAC. You will achieve this through rapid creative testing, campaign optimization, setup improvements, and scaling winning approaches across new and existing acquisition verticals. Fjor Nutrition INC. is a consumer health company dedicated to developing an AI-powered nutrition assistant that empowers individuals to maintain and enhance their overall health and well-being while making personal self-care accessible, efficient, and enjoyable. The flagship projects of Fjor is 1) Keto Diet App, an industry-leading iOS application catering to the keto and low-carb market in the USA and 2) Formula.care that focus on carnivore and mediterranean diets. The company has achieved over $40M in sales, 7M installations, and 500K subscribers since launch. We are a highly effective, small team of 16 people, with experience from top tech companies such as Uber, Google, Yandex, Tinkoff, and Alfabank. Our fully remote team operates with a main hub in Amsterdam. We value flexibility, independence, and aim to keep bureaucracy to a minimum. Learn more about our founders, Evgeny Severenkov & Andrew Kopanev. Responsibilities: Lead paid social campaigns  on Meta* and TikTok to drive user acquisition at scale. Develop and execute UA strategies  to achieve aggressive growth targets while maintaining efficiency (CPS, Gross Profit, ROAS, LTV). Manage daily budgets  ($80K-$120K/day) across channels with a focus on performance optimization. Run rapid creative testing  in collaboration with the creative team: launch 150-200+ new creatives per week, scale winners, and kill underperformers fast. Analyze performance data deeply  to generate insights and iterate on ads, audiences, optimization and funnels. Work cross-functionally  with creative, growth and analytics teams to maximize acquisition outcomes. Continuously research and implement  new strategies, trends, and platform innovations. Contribute to funnel optimization : collaborate with product and web teams to improve conversion rates (C1), ARPU, and LTV. Requirements: 3+ years of hands-on experience  managing paid social UA at high scale, preferably in mobile/web subscription businesses. Strong understanding of performance marketing KPIs  and how to optimize for both short-term and long-term value (CPS, Gross Profit, ROAS, LTV). Deep platform expertise : Meta Ads Manager*, TikTok Ads, Amplitude. Experience with creative strategy and testing : ability to test, evaluate, and scale creative assets systematically. Analytical mindset : comfortable working with dashboards, pulling reports, identifying actionable insights. Proactive and autonomous : you take ownership and drive projects without micromanagement. What We Offer: Inspiring Mission : Help users live longer, healthier lives through innovative products. Impact : Directly influence company growth with minimal bureaucracy. Attractive Compensation : Competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package. Work-Life Balance : Flexible working hours. Professional Development : Tuition reimbursement. Remote Work : Fully remote, with a preference for candidates within ¬±2 hours of CET. Comprehensive Benefits : Health insurance, gym membership reimbursement, home office support. *  –ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è Meta –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∞ —ç–∫—Å—Ç—Ä–µ–º–∏—Å—Ç—Å–∫–æ–π –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π –∏¬†–∑–∞–ø—Ä–µ—â–µ–Ω–∞ –≤¬†–†–§.

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ We‚Äôre on the lookout for a talented Marketing Designer to join the Zendrop Marketing Team ‚Äî someone who can help shape our website, landing pages, and brand visuals. You‚Äôll also collaborate on evolving Zendrop‚Äôs visual language and support the development of a thoughtful, growing design culture together with our Head of Design. text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ About company AI-powered image generation and editing tool for designers, illustrators, and marketers to easily create and refine visuals‚Äîimages, vector graphics, icons, and even 3D models. HQ in London. Fast-growing startup trusted by industry leaders like Netflix, Asana, and Airbus. 3M+ users across 200+ countries, with over 350M images created. Strong engineering culture, driven by top-tier engineers from leading tech companies like Yandex, JetBrains, Aviasales and Huawei. Backed by top investors, including Khosla Ventures and former GitHub CEO. Job Description As a Software Engineer, you'll play a pivotal role in shaping the user experience of our main product. Your objective is to provide the best user experience and remain adaptable. This means you'll collaborate extensively with colleagues from Design, Backend, and ML teams to grasp project requirements, suggest cost-effective approaches, and translate them into sophisticated, efficient, and maintainable frontend code. Key Responsibilities Work closely with Product, Engineers, and fellow Developers to transform features and ideas into clear requirements and estimations for implementation. Develop and sustain reusable and neat frontend components and modules. Enhance web applications for speed, performance, and scalability. Identify and resolve issues, bugs, and other frontend-related challenges. Propose and maintain process improvements within the team. Ensure the codebase is clean and maintainable, and test your solutions using automation. Collaborate with a team dedicated to swift project delivery. Requirements Over 2 years of professional experience in Software Engineering. Proficiency in React. Ability to communicate in English (intermediate level or above is sufficient). A familiarity with algorithms is a must (algorithmic skills will be assessed during the interview). Ability to collaborate effectively in a dynamic, fast-paced startup environment. Willingness to take on creative tasks and dive into source code to resolve issues. Strong problem-solving skills and a keen eye for detail. Self-motivated with a proactive approach. An additional advantage if you have experience with graphics engines and webworkers (e.g., Pixi.js, Skia). What We Offer Full-time, office-based position in London. Relocation support. Competitive salary. Flexible working hours. Paid vacations (26 working days per year). Opportunities for professional growth and development. A supportive and collaborative work environment. The chance to work on exciting projects and make a significant impact on our brand.

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ About the company We are an international technology company developing digital solutions for content distribution and personalization. Working with large-scale data, we employ cutting-edge models, including proprietary AI solutions, fine-tuned LLMs and third-party integrations. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into real-world applications. Researching and experimenting with state-of-the-art ML techniques to improve model accuracy and efficiency. Ensuring AI models operate efficiently at scale and can handle large datasets and real-time processing. Continuously monitoring, evaluating, and refining deployed models while adhering to AI ethics, data privacy, and security standards. Contributions to open-source AI/ML projects or published research (preferred). Proficiency in Python (specifically PyTorch) and other AI/ML frameworks. Strong understanding of deep learning, NLP, and/or computer vision techniques. Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) for AI/ML workloads. Familiarity with MLOps best practices (monitoring, versioning, CI/CD). Strong problem-solving skills and ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment. Excellent communication skills and ability to work with cross-functional teams. Fluent English (B2/C1) Benefits of working with us: Fully remote position (40 hours per week) . Opportunity to work with cutting-edge AI technologies and solve complex problems. Collaboration with a highly skilled and motivated team in a dynamic environment.

While AI has transformed modern IDEs, a terminal stays the same inefficient technology since the 1970s. As a leading cross-platform SSH client, our mission is to boost productivity and foster collaboration by rebuilding the Terminal for the modern era. We are actively growing and seeking¬†for a  Senior Frontend Engineers  to complement our team and help us make Termius the primary work instrument for many engineers worldwide in their daily routines. Why Join Termius: Your contributions will directly influence the experience of millions of engineers and shape the future of system management tools. The speed and quality of decision making depend on the accessibility of information. We aim for full transparency in all our actions. We share and ask for the candid feedback needed to become great. We build for system engineers and aim to make complex things feel simple and visually appealing. text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ Termius  is a modern SSH client built for collaboration and productivity. It organizes infrastructure knowledge and helps troubleshoot incidents quickly to reduce costly downtime. Today, our customers include over 30,000 companies, and millions of engineers use Termius to connect to their remote servers. While AI has transformed modern IDEs, a terminal stays the same inefficient technology since the 1970s. As a leading cross-platform SSH client, our mission is to boost productivity and foster collaboration by rebuilding the Terminal for the modern era. We are actively growing and seeking for a  Senior Backend Engineers  to complement our team and help us make Termius the primary work instrument for many engineers worldwide in their daily routines. Why Join Termius: Your contributions will directly influence the experience of millions of engineers and shape the future of system management tools. The speed and quality of decision-making depend on the accessibility of information. We aim for full transparency in all our actions. We share and ask for the candid feedback needed to become great. We build for system engineers and aim to make complex things feel simple and visually appealing. Be part of a culture that values proactiveness, a fail-fast-learn-fast approach, and a strong sense of ownership. Your work will include: Participation in the entire application development lifecycle. Collaboration between different departments: design, dev, QA across multiple time zones. Design, develop, and implement robust backend services using strong engineering principles. Collaborate with frontend engineers and product managers to translate user needs into technical solutions. Optimize existing systems for performance, reliability, scalability, and security. Participate in code reviews and ensure high code quality throughout the codebase. Automate tasks and implement CI/CD pipelines to streamline development workflows. Troubleshoot and debug complex backend issues. Stay up-to-date with the latest backend technologies and trends. Requirements: 5+ years of experience as a backend engineer. Strong proficiency in Python. Experience with relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL). Experience with building RESTful APIs. Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure, Kubernetes). Experience with Docker. Solid understanding of system design principles (e.g., scalability, security). Experience with version control systems (e.g.,Git). Ability to work independently and as part of a cross-functional team. English skills (both written and verbal) Optional but welcomed skills: Experience with SSH protocol and network engineering. What do we offer: We provide employees with the necessary equipment to create a productive work environment. Longevity benefits: paid vacation, sick leaves, and flexible timeoff. A culture that encourages proactiveness, a fail-fast-learn-fast approach, and a sense of ownership. You can apply directly through our Lever form using this link:  https://jobs.lever.co/Termius/2af70998-3d68-4aae-94c5-82274eaff54a

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ About the company The company is developing a next-generation AI tool tailored for professional designers, illustrators, and marketers, setting a new standard in image generation. Its platform empowers creators to quickly produce and iterate on original images, vector art, illustrations, icons, and 3D graphics using AI. Trusted by industry leaders like Netflix, Asana, and Airbus, the platform is used by over 3 million users in 200+ countries, with more than 350 million images created to date. The company‚Äôs mission is to become an essential, daily tool for every designer, giving creators full control over their creative process. It is focused on delivering innovative features that support large-scale creative projects and redefine the future of design with AI. About the role The company is looking for  Senior ML Research Engineer  who is passionate about generative AI and eager to work on cutting-edge technologies that push the boundaries of what's possible in AI-driven creativity. In this role, you'll help build, improve, and launch large AI models.¬† What you'll do Design and improve large-scale generative models (e.g., image generation, audio synthesis, or large language models), going beyond existing open-source solutions. Set up and conduct a large number of experiments and hypothesis tests, with a strong focus on iterative research and learning from failed attempts. Build full-cycle ML pipelines: from data collection and preprocessing to model training, validation, and evaluation. Write clean, scalable code and ensure models meet production quality standards. Collaborate closely with the team ‚Äî share ideas, review approaches, and take initiative in developing new solutions. Who we look for Solid experience in training large-scale generative models, such as image generation, audio synthesis, or LLMs. Experience in evaluating generative models, with a deep understanding of qualitative and quantitative metrics. Strong hands-on skills with PyTorch and familiarity with modern neural network architectures. Proven ability to build end-to-end ML pipelines ‚Äî from data collection and preprocessing to model training, evaluation, and deployment. Strong software development background with a focus on writing clean, production-ready code. What we offer Full-time, office-based position in London. Relocation support available for non-UK candidates. Competitive salary. Flexible working hours. Paid vacations (26 working days per year). Opportunities for professional growth and development. A supportive and collaborative work environment. The chance to work on exciting projects and make a significant impact on our brand.

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ What you should do: Development and support of anti-fraud strategies: Development and implementation of rules for fraud detection at all stages of the credit process (application analysis, decision-making, underwriting, post-monitoring). Evaluating the effectiveness of anti-fraud solutions and adjusting strategies. Implementation of anti-fraud rules and use of external data (government services, credit history bureaus, telco, etc.). Data analysis: Collecting and analysing data to identify fraudulent activities, Data visualisation, preparation of regular reports and analytics for management.Hypothesis generation and testing: Forming hypotheses to identify new fraud schemes and product vulnerabilities: Conducting A/B testing and pilot runs to test hypotheses. Assessing the impact of hypotheses on business processes and optimising solutions based on them. Providing anti-fraud expertise: Providing fraud prevention expertise and advice to related teams and management. Suport underwriting process. POS Agent Support: Evaluating POS agents' performance in anti-fraud interventions. Designing program to improve agent performance based on the results of their performance evaluation and providing recommendations for their development. What you should have: Minimum of 3 years working in risk management or fraud prevention in the financial industry. Experience in building fraud prevention systems and analysing data at all stages of the credit process (application, decision making, monitoring). –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ Social Links  is a leading global OSINT company headquartered in the US, integrating data from over 500 open sources‚Äîsocial media, messengers, blockchains, and the Dark Web‚Äîto deliver cutting-edge solutions for investigations, compliance, and risk analytics. Our Open Data & AI platform powers hundreds of organizations across 80+ countries. We‚Äôre rapidly scaling our infrastructure team to support next-gen hybrid and cloud-based solutions. If you thrive on impactful challenges and seek a clear path to DevOps/SRE, join us! About the Role We‚Äôre looking for a  senior-level SysOps Engineer  with deep Linux expertise who is passionate about creating reliable, scalable infrastructure. While our current stack heavily features on-prem infrastructure (Linux, bare-metal, virtualization, networking), we‚Äôre actively moving toward a hybrid/cloud environment (AWS/Kubernetes). Your role is vital: ensuring the resilience, security, and scalability of systems critical to our global operations. You‚Äôll influence our infrastructure strategy, automate processes, and play a key part in our evolution toward modern DevOps and SRE practices. What You‚Äôll Do: ‚Ä¢ Design, implement, and manage robust on-prem and hybrid cloud infrastructure ‚Ä¢ Administer Linux-based servers (RHEL, CentOS, Ubuntu), virtualization, and networks ‚Ä¢ Configure VPNs, firewalls, and internal network services (NGINX, HAProxy) ‚Ä¢ Deploy and maintain Kubernetes clusters and related networking components ‚Ä¢ Implement infrastructure automation using Ansible and Bash scripting (Python as a plus) ‚Ä¢ Ensure high-availability and disaster recovery for databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MariaDB, Elasticsearch, RabbitMQ, Minio) ‚Ä¢ Maintain and enhance monitoring solutions (Zabbix, Prometheus, Grafana, ELK/OpenSearch) ‚Ä¢ Document infrastructure clearly (Wiki, Google Docs) to facilitate team collaboration What We Expect From You: ‚Ä¢ 3+ years of Linux administration experience (RHEL, CentOS, Ubuntu) ‚Ä¢ Deep knowledge of TCP/IP networking at L2/L3/L7 levels ‚Ä¢ Strong experience configuring NGINX, HAProxy, Kubernetes Ingress ‚Ä¢ Basic experience with databases and message queues (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MariaDB, Elasticsearch, RabbitMQ, Minio) ‚Ä¢ Experience with monitoring and log management systems (Zabbix, ELK/OpenSearch) ‚Ä¢ Strong Bash scripting skills for automation, Python scripting as a plus ‚Ä¢ Experience with AWS infrastructure deployment and security policy management (huge plus) ‚Ä¢ Willingness to learn and actively contribute ‚Ä¢ Proactive, ownership-driven approach with strong documentation habits Bonus Skills (Nice to Have): ‚Ä¢ Experience writing SELinux policies ‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Kubernetes/Rancher ‚Ä¢ Experience setting up CI/CD pipelines with GitLab ‚Ä¢ Knowledge of mesh networking and network diagnostics ‚Ä¢ Basic experience in routing and firewall scripting with IPTables ‚Ä¢ Administration of XCP-ng hypervisors (Citrix Hypervisor) ‚Ä¢ Understanding of information security principles, familiarity with Greenbone/Suricata Growth Opportunities: ‚Ä¢ Flexible and transparent engineering career track tailored to your growth ‚Ä¢ Clear career path toward DevOps/SRE roles as we evolve to hybrid/cloud environments ‚Ä¢ Influence infrastructure strategy in a company-wide transformation ‚Ä¢ Access internal mentorship, modern tools, best practices, and continuous learning opportunities ‚Ä¢ Opportunity to acquire new competencies and technical skills within a supportive environment Why Join Social Links: ‚Ä¢ Work with global products and cutting-edge OSINT/AI technologies ‚Ä¢ Real impact, clear ownership, and measurable outcomes ‚Ä¢ Fully remote work flexibility (excluding Russia and Belarus) ‚Ä¢ Stock options and long-term growth incentives ‚Ä¢ Engaged, collaborative culture with a startup spirit ‚Ä¢ Challenging tasks in a company rapidly becoming an industry leader Ready for your next big challenge? Join Social Links and shape the future of data-driven intelligence solutions.

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ Hula  is an AI-powered photo/video creation app where users turn selfies into viral videos, stickers, and animations. The product is evolving fast, and we try to catch visual trends quicker than our competitors (Hula recently hit the top of the Appstore charts in the US in Photo & Video!). We‚Äôre now looking for a  Senior Graphic Designer  to join our small but mighty marketing team. Someone who‚Äôs comfortable working from a clear brief, but also brings in original ideas and owns them ‚Äì so we‚Äôre not relying on just one creative brain (our lead‚Äôs) for every breakthrough. You‚Äôll join daily mini-brainstorms, work with cutting-edge AI tools, and help us keep our visuals sharp, current and scroll-stopping (: Responsibilities Design ad creatives, banners, social media visuals, and simple motion teasers. Use AI tools (Midjourney, Krea, Runway, etc.) to boost speed, originality, and output. Develop reusable templates and style guides to streamline production; Identify emerging visual trends ‚Üí turn them into actionable ideas. Collaborate closely with our motion designers and marketing design lead. Deliver 4-5 creative packs per week, including 1-2 quick iterations per day when needed. Basic¬†After Effects¬†skills (simple animations, slideshows). Strong portfolio of creatives that performed well ‚Äì not just looked good. text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ About the Role As a Senior Backend Engineer at Zentist your work drives the business. Every commit you make to automate manual workflows saves more people from enduring thousands of hours of frustration in dental offices across the USA. You and your team pioneer solutions to make the system reliable, scalable, and easy to reason about. Your team Develops the automated data flows which power our entire business, saving dental offices significant time and money Creates new interfaces to an increasing number of dental back office systems, increasing Zentist's impact in the market Evaluates capabilities and limitations of our existing architecture and creates the next generation of systems to effortlessly scale to thousands of practices Raises the bar in our pursuit of small, fast, quality releases which incrementally create a great experience for both internal and external customers You come to us with Several years of development experience. You directly influence the technical design of critical systems and shepherd them through the entire development process. Experience contributing to web applications written in Python and frequently collaborating with front end developers. A drive to continually increase your team's code quality by promoting best practices and techniques based on your real-life experience. Integration experience that makes the best use of available APIs and support while identifying and building around their limitations. History of continuous learning and improvement, keeping your skills current and leading to an understanding of new technical options. Our teams currently use Python 3.x, Flask, DJango and FastAPI in different subsystems, Graphene, Alchemy, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Docker, K8s, PlayWright, PyTest, React and various 3rd party APIs. ‚Äã ‚Äã

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ Wheely is not a traditional ride-hailing company. We are building a platform with user privacy at its core while successfully scaling a five-star service to millions of rides across multiple cities. We're actively growing and are now looking for a skilled Tech Recruiter to join our Nicosia office. In this role, you'll be working with a high level of autonomy, managing a variety of international job openings for a global tech company. Your job scope would cover the complete talent acquisition process. If you're passionate about tech and would like to contribute your skills and knowledge to building a world-class product, jump in. What the job involves Full cycle recruitment for (mostly) senior engineering and product management roles across all our locations (CY, UK in particular) You will be working with a high level of autonomy Helping Wheely shape a more transparent and efficient recruitment process Participating in marketing and PR activities aiming to improve the HR brand Requirements 2+ years of tech (engineering) recruitment experience at a scale-up or large tech Cross-border and cross-cultural experience is highly appreciated Profound knowledge of all modern sourcing technologies Great communication skills and client-centered approach Self-discipline and ability to work autonomously Fluent English What We Offer Wheely expects the very best from our people, both on the road and in the office. In return, employees enjoy flexible working hours, and an exceptional range of perks and benefits. Competitive salary with a quarterly performance-based bonus Private health insurance Lunch allowance Professional development subsidies Best-in-class equipment This is an office-based role located in Nicosia. Wheely has an in-person culture but allows flexible working hours and work from home when needed. In most cases, we expect team members to be in the office at least four days a week.
requirements: ['2+ years of tech (engineering) recruitment experience at a scale-up or large tech', 'Cross-border and cross-cultural experience is highly appreciated', 'Profound knowledge of all modern sourcing technologies', 'Great communication skills and client-centered approach', 'Self-discipline and ability to work autonomously', 'Fluent English']
responsibilities: ['Full cycle recruitment for (mostly) senior engineering and product management roles across all our locations (CY, UK in particular)', 'Helping Wheely shape a more transparent and efficient recruitment process', 'Participating in marketing and PR activities aiming to improve the HR brand']

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ ‚úàÔ∏è Assaia provides AI-based software solutions for global airports and airlines. We were founded in February 2018 in Switzerland, headquartered in Zurich and New York and we have a fast-growing team located across Europe and North America. Assaia offers AI-based computer-vision solutions that monitor and analyse aircraft turnaround processes from video streams. Assaia‚Äôs solutions help airports and airlines improve on-time performance, efficiency, safety, and sustainability metrics, helping them get their passengers to their destinations on time. We work with aviation companies across the world including New York JFKIAT, Toronto Pearson, United Airlines, British Airways, London Heathrow and more. See details and demos on our website and Linkedin! We‚Äôre looking for a proactive Middle Python Engineer (ML Ops) to help us scale our video analytics solution across multiple airports and support deployment at the scale of thousands of stands. You‚Äôll work closely with both researchers and infrastructure engineers to ensure our pipelines are production-ready, efficient, and easy to use, even by non-ML specialists. Responsibilities: Maintain and improve our training infrastructure, enabling model trainers to test, train neural networks efficiently. Own and scale delivery pipelines from research prototypes to robust production systems, making them accessible to users without ML expertise. Actively participate in brainstorming and design discussions to improve processes and tools. Proactively identify weak spots in our system and suggest improvements to increase performance, reliability, and scalability. Requirements: 3+ years of production experience in Python. Solid understanding of data structures and algorithms to write optimized and scalable code. Confident in using LLM-based tools to write clean, efficient code, even in unfamiliar areas like front-end or DevOps tasks. Strong experience deploying and managing services in Kubernetes. Comfortable communicating and collaborating in English (B2+). Nice to have: Solid understanding of basic ML terminology (e.g. model evaluation, training loops, metrics). Hands-on experience working with large-scale video data (e.g. multi-terabyte datasets, storage optimization, video preprocessing pipelines). Experience with technologies from our stack: Django, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, Docker, Kubernetes. Assaia is a unique place where you can work on a technically advanced and innovative product for an exciting and important industry. You will be working in a diverse international team of smart people who can learn a lot from each other ‚Äì all this without leaving your home ‚Äì or sunbed, if you wish! Your input will be valuable and we actively ask everyone to share their thoughts and ideas to help steer the direction of the company‚Äôs development. Additionally, we offer: Always remote work and flexible schedule. The candidates should be based outside of Russia and Belarus. 5 weeks of paid vacation, paid sick leave, paid relevant courses and conferences/online education/English courses. Regular performance reviews to make sure you enjoy your tasks, challenges, growth and salary. Flat hierarchy and close to zero bureaucracy, a diverse international team of smart people. Live team events in Europe.
requirements: ['3+ years of production experience in Python', 'Solid understanding of data structures and algorithms to write optimized and scalable code', 'Confident in using LLM-based tools to write clean, efficient code, even in unfamiliar areas like front-end or DevOps tasks', 'Strong experience deploying and managing services in Kubernetes', 'Comfortable communicating and collaborating in English (B2+)']

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ Crystalia Glass LLC is a leading provider of premium glass products, dedicated to transforming spaces with elegance and sophistication. With a commitment to craftsmanship and innovation, we specialize in designing and manufacturing high-quality glass solutions for residential and commercial projects. Founded in 2017 in New York, the company has expanded its presence with offices in Los Angeles, Florida, and Texas. As a nationwide company, we serve clients across America, offering our signature glass products and services to diverse markets. We are expanding our team and actively seeking an experienced Talent Acquisition Manager to join us. We consider candidates from anywhere in the world! Responsibilities Attracting candidates for Middle Level client-faced positions positions Crafting candidate profiles effectively Leveraging specialized sources to build candidate pipelines Employing diverse recruitment methods tailored to the respective level of personnel Guiding candidates through the hiring funnel with care Meeting vacancy closure deadlines Initiating search processes promptly Creating job protocols, test assignments, and criteria for probationary period completion ¬† Requirements Analytical skills: Ability to analyze hiring data, identify trends, and recommend improvements Experience working with client-faced roles: sales executives, account managers, business development managers, customer support etc Fluent English (C1) Organized, results-oriented, works with urgency Relevant full-lifecycle Talent Acquisition/Staffing experience in international companies or agencies is a plus Relevant work experience of active recruitment for at least 3 years Conditions What we offer: Competitive salary based on skills and experience (base+bonus); Paid vacation and sick leave What you get by working with us: You have the option to start and finish work earlier. Main office working hours are from 8:30 AM to 5:00 PM EST Friendly and experienced team Opportunity for self-realization and being part of a high-demand project! Fully remote work ¬† Next Step: After reviewing your profile, you will receive an invitation to participate in a virtual video interview via HireFlix. This is an excellent opportunity for us to get to know you better and for you to showcase your skills and experience. By completing this virtual interview, you will be prioritized for further review, allowing our HR team to evaluate your candidacy more swiftly. Completion of this step will expedite the scheduling of a formal interview with our team.

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ About us: Evo Systems  is a technology marketing and sales partner for off-plan property developers in the GCC and Asia. As of 2022, we are based at Dubai Silicon Oasis - the hub where technology meets the real estate market. We are a team of experts bringing cutting-edge strategies to the property market using data analytics. We create solutions not for the sake of technology, but to actually increase sales, shorten the transaction cycle and increase profits. Project overview: Our solution operates across three streams to boost sales for developers during the off-plan stage of residential property sales. We focus on visualization and offer a quick selection of options for clients choosing apartments, whether for investment or personal living. The tool is currently used by agents and sales managers on all devices ‚Äî from TVs in the office to mobile phones. Web brick ‚Äî interactive online catalogue Push plan ‚Äî AI 3D tour generation Agent pluss ‚Äî connection with 30 000+ globally Our ideal candidate: The ideal candidate must possess a strong passion for agent service and delivering exceptional service Excellent communication and interpersonal skills are critical, as well as effectively collaborating with stakeholders and converting clients into new contracts Effective communication in English (C1) both written and spoken forms Educational and professional background: A candidate should possess over 2 years of experience in customer experience or back-office process management Bachelor's degree in business analysis, management, finance or related field preferred What will you do in this position? Customer assistance:  providing prompt and efficient support via chat, email, and other communication channels, ensuring compliance with SLA standards and converting agents into signed contracts. Support is provided in written form only Documentation management:  maintain accurate records of client interactions, issues, and resolutions in the company's systems Product knowledge:  stay updated on the company‚Äôs products and services to provide accurate information Issue resolution:  troubleshoot agent issues, provide guidance, and escalate cases when necessary to ensure timely resolution Client education:  assist in educating clients on product features, updates, and best practices to enhance their user experience Organisation and administration:  ‚Ä¢ Creating and setting up groups and supergroups in WhatsApp ‚Ä¢ Controlling the structure of communication: implementing rules, anchoring messages and formatting information ‚Ä¢ Setting up access and roles for participants and administrators Monitoring and reporting:  ‚Ä¢ Tracking participant activity and engagement ‚Ä¢ Maintaining a list of groups and their structure in Google Sheets or Notion ‚Ä¢ Generating weekly reports with information on activity and suggestions for improvement What do we offer? A fast-growing, globally operating company with clients who truly need our product Competitive salary Full-time remote opportunity Professional development and growth potential, no matter the location

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ NOTE ! We will not invite you for an interview if you do not have  experience writing scripts for short advertising videos . Scripts for YouTube episodes or films are not considered relevant experience. English level: B2 or higher. Applications without a portfolio will not be reviewed. Candidate location is also important: Not Russia or Belarus. We're seeking a talented  creative producer for commercials  to join the Newmindstart team. Newmindstart.com is an online platform for self-development, health enhancement, and well-being through yoga, meditation, dance, and singing, offering courses and live sessions by global experts. Abundance of knowledge: Today, we offer over 120+ awesome courses in English, each of which is a key to new horizons. ‚ùáÔ∏èResponsibilities: - Review all courses submitted to the department; - Adapt authors' texts to sales-optimized page structures and scripts according to the well-established technology in our company; - Set tasks and control the results of executors (copywriters, translators, editors, designers); - Develop creative materials for courses in collaboration with the advertising department, testing hypotheses for better sales through advertising; - Maintain statistics, monitor figures, document packaging processes, and continuously improve them. ‚ùáÔ∏èOur Candidate: - Has an experience in producing sales-oriented videos (ads or reels), - Understands how to attract attention in video and formulate selling points in text, - Has an eye for current trends on Instagram, Facebook*, TikTok, - Has an English level of B2 and higher, - Is interested in the topic of women's self-development. Preferable: - Has an experience in producing landing pages, - Has relevant experience in an advertising agency, - Has experience in the international markets. ‚ùáÔ∏èWe offer: - Innovative and trendy product with scientifically proven effectiveness; - Work in a promising niche in a strong project with global ambitions; - Work in a team of real professionals where you will gain valuable experience; - Remote work, with no regular office trips and strict dress code. ¬† *  Facebook –ø—Ä–∏–Ω–∞–¥–ª–µ–∂–∏—Ç –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ Meta (–ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∞ —ç–∫—Å—Ç—Ä–µ–º–∏—Å—Ç—Å–∫–æ–π –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π –∏¬†–∑–∞–ø—Ä–µ—â–µ–Ω–∞ –≤¬†–†–§).

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ We are a fast-growing and innovative technology company, focused on advancing solutions in the renewable energy industry. As part of our continued growth, we are looking for an experienced and highly skilled Senior DevOps Engineer to join our team. This role is essential in shaping and maintaining our cloud infrastructure, driving automation, and ensuring the high performance and reliability of our software systems. Key Responsibilities Work in close collaboration with software developers to design, build, and optimize CI/CD pipelines using GitLab for streamlined software delivery. ¬† Administer and enhance our cloud infrastructure hosted on Microsoft Azure and Google Cloud Platform, ensuring it is secure, scalable, and reliable. ¬† Use Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform and Docker to manage infrastructure provisioning and configuration. ¬† Continuously monitor infrastructure health and application performance, resolving issues proactively and ensuring minimal downtime. ¬† Identify opportunities to enhance automation, efficiency, and reliability within deployment and operations workflows. ¬† Remain current with DevOps best practices, cloud technologies, and emerging tools. ¬† Your Background A Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline. ¬† A minimum of 8 years of DevOps engineering experience, ideally in a senior capacity. ¬† A total of at least 12 years in the broader IT field. ¬† Strong hands-on experience with configuration management, especially using Ansible. ¬† In-depth knowledge of container orchestration and microservices using Kubernetes and Docker. ¬† Proven expertise in managing Linux-based systems and environments. ¬† Experience with public cloud platforms, particularly Azure and/or GCP. ¬† Solid understanding of networking and cloud security (load balancing, VPNs, encryption, certificate and key management). ¬† Familiarity with horizontal autoscaling in microservices environments. ¬† Skilled in using IaC tools like Terraform, Azure Resource Manager, or CloudFormation. ¬† Practical experience working with GitLab CI/CD pipelines. ¬† Previous usage of project collaboration tools such as Jira and Confluence. ¬† Comfortable working in an agile, dynamic environment with shifting priorities. ¬† Strong attention to detail, analytical mindset, and communication skills. ¬† What We Offer Join a collaborative team culture that values continuous learning, technical excellence, and mutual support. ¬† Be part of a purpose-driven organization contributing to the global shift toward sustainable energy. ¬† Work with modern tools and influence the selection and evolution of our technology stack. ¬† Opportunity for professional growth and active involvement in strategic technology decisions. ¬† A competitive salary and benefits package, combined with the flexibility of remote work. ¬† If you are motivated by the prospect of working on meaningful technology in a dynamic team, we welcome your application. Please send us your CV along with a short cover letter outlining your relevant experience and motivation for applying.

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ –ú–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–µ—Ä –ø–æ –ø—Ä–æ–¥–∞–∂–∞–º/–ú–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–µ—Ä –ø–æ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—é –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å–∞ (—Å –º–µ–¥–∏—Ü–∏–Ω—Å–∫–∏–º –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º)/Business Development Manager –≤ –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—É—é –º–µ–¥–∏—Ü–∏–Ω—Å–∫—É—é –∫–æ–Ω—Å–∞–ª—Ç–∏–Ω–≥–æ–≤—É—é –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—é –ú–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–Ω—Å–∞–ª—Ç–∏–Ω–≥–æ–≤–∞—è –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è MTRC , –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–µ–π—à–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π –º–µ–¥–∏—Ü–∏–Ω—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –æ–±–æ—Ä—É–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ —Ä–∞—Å—Ö–æ–¥–Ω—ã—Ö –º–∞—Ç–µ—Ä–∏–∞–ª–æ–≤ (www.mtrconsult.com), –∏—â–µ—Ç  –º–µ–Ω–µ–¥–∂–µ—Ä–∞ –ø–æ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏—é –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å–∞ —Å –º–µ–¥–∏—Ü–∏–Ω—Å–∫–∏–º –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º . MTRC ‚Äî –ª–∏–¥–µ—Ä –≤ –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç–∏  market access  (–¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞ –Ω–∞ —Ä—ã–Ω–æ–∫) –¥–ª—è –º–µ–¥–∏—Ü–∏–Ω—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏–π –≤ –ï–≤—Ä–æ–ø–µ. –°—Ä–µ–¥–∏ –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ ‚Äî 17 –∏–∑ —Ç–æ–ø-30 –≥–ª–æ–±–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π –º–µ–¥–∏—Ü–∏–Ω—Å–∫–∏—Ö –∏–∑–¥–µ–ª–∏–π, –ª–æ–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –∏ –¥–µ—Å—è—Ç–∫–∏ –∏–Ω–Ω–æ–≤–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—Ç–∞–ø–æ–≤. –° –º–æ–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –≤ 2017 –≥–æ–¥—É –≤ –°—Ç–æ–∫–≥–æ–ª—å–º–µ –Ω–∞—à–∞ –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–∞—è –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥–∞ –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤ (–≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—è 12 –≤—Ä–∞—á–µ–π –∏ 6 –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç–æ–≤ –º–µ–¥–∏—Ü–∏–Ω—Å–∫–∏—Ö –Ω–∞—É–∫) —É—Å–ø–µ—à–Ω–æ —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–ª–∞ –±–æ–ª–µ–µ  900 –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ . –®—Ç–∞–±-–∫–≤–∞—Ä—Ç–∏—Ä–∞ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—Å—è –≤ –ë–æ–ª–≥–∞—Ä–∏–∏, —Å –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞–º–∏ –≤ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∞—Ö –ï–° –∏ –í–µ–ª–∏–∫–æ–±—Ä–∏—Ç–∞–Ω–∏–∏. –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –≤–µ–¥–µ—Ç—Å—è —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ, –∞ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–∏ —Ä–∞—Å–ø–æ–ª–∞–≥–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–Ω—ã—Ö —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–∞—Ö. MTRC —Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∞ –ø–æ —Å—Ç–∞–Ω–¥–∞—Ä—Ç—É  ISO9001:2015  –∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç –ª—É—á—à–∏–µ –º–∏—Ä–æ–≤—ã–µ –ø—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∏–∫–∏ –≤ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–∏, –æ–ø–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è—Ö, –º–∞—Ä–∫–µ—Ç–∏–Ω–≥–µ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–¥–∞–∂–∞—Ö. –ú—ã –≥–æ—Ä–¥–∏–º—Å—è –Ω–∞—à–µ–π  —Å–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ—Ä–ø–æ—Ä–∞—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–π –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–æ–π , —á—Ç–æ –ø–æ–¥—Ç–≤–µ—Ä–∂–¥–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ–º —É–¥–æ–≤–ª–µ—Ç–≤–æ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏–∫–æ–≤ ‚Äî  89% . –ú—ã –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º –Ω–æ–≤—ã–º —á–ª–µ–Ω–∞–º –∫–æ–º–∞–Ω–¥—ã —É–Ω–∏–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—É—é –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∞ –∏ –≤–∑–∞–∏–º–æ–¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è —Å –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ –Ω–∞ –≤—ã—Å—à–µ–º —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ. –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∞—è, –≤–µ–¥–µ—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∞  –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–º —è–∑—ã–∫–µ . Responsibilities: Preparing and delivering commercial offers and technical proposals for medical reimbursement consulting services. Participating in client meetings and presentations, acting as a trusted medical and business advisor. Engaging with clients to understand their needs and provide tailored solutions. text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ Hey, hey! We are looking QA Engineer to our team! Responsibilities: 1.¬† Manual Testing (Primary Focus Initially) ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Analyze product requirements and create clear, comprehensive test plans and test cases. ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Perform functional, regression, integration, and exploratory testing. ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Track, document, and prioritize defects using JIRA ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Collaborate closely with developers, product managers to resolve issues. ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Participate in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives to ensure QA alignment. ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Provide detailed test reports and maintain documentation of test results. ¬†¬†2.¬† Transition to Automation (Development Path) ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Undergo structured training to gain proficiency in automation tools. ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Work alongside senior QA team members to develop and maintain automated test scripts. ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Contribute to improving the existing automation framework, including refactoring code and enhancing coverage. ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Participate in code reviews for automated test scripts to ensure best practices are followed. ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Eventually take ownership of automated testing pipelines and contribute to the CI/CD process. Requirements: ‚Ä¢¬† Experience: 1-2 years as a Manual QA or similar testing role. ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Technical Skills: ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Solid understanding of QA methodologies, test planning, and testing techniques. ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Familiarity with bug tracking (JIRA) and test management tools. ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Basic knowledge of SDLC and Agile/Scrum methodologies. Soft Skills: ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Excellent attention to detail and analytical thinking. ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Clear and concise communication skills, both written and verbal. ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Team player attitude, with willingness to learn and adapt. Preferred Skills (or Eager to Learn) ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Programming Languages: Exposure to one or more languages (Python, Java, JavaScript). ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† Automation Tools & Frameworks: Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, etc. ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† API Testing: Experience or familiarity with tools like Postman or Swagger. ¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬† CI/CD Knowledge: Understanding of how testing fits into the pipeline (GitLab CI, GitHub Actions). Work format:  Remote Employment:  Full-time Salary:  XX$/hour English:  Upper-Intermediate

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ International IT Company Seeks HR Business Partner We are a global tech company creating innovative products and investing in websites and applications (approximately 50 platforms) across industries such as  global dating, entertainment, social games, streaming, and AI . Our solutions target key markets:  the USA, Canada, the UK, Western Europe, Australia, and Asia . Your main tasks will be: Ensure the effectiveness of the personnel within the business unit, ensuring that employees contribute to achieving the company's strategic goals and financial targets. Manage staffing, ensuring the business unit has the right number of people who have successfully completed their probationary period and meet the company's satisfaction. Foster employee engagement and retention, creating a work environment where employees are motivated and committed to staying with the company and taking on new responsibilities. Implement and enforce HR processes within the business unit, ensuring compliance with company policies and regulations. Monitor and measure the satisfaction of managers and employees of the business unit with the HR function. We expect from you: 2-3+ years of successful experience in a similar HR BP/HRD position in an international digital/IT/product company. Live abroad or be ready for relocation Able to implement and ensure the execution of basic employee lifecycle HR processes: hiring, onboarding, training and development, succession planning, termination, performance evaluation, etc. Able to manage the budget for salaries and benefits, turnover, employee engagement and loyalty, and provide measurable examples of the impact on these indicators. Has experience in coaching managers in direct reports or in the area of responsibility. A problem solver able to take responsibility. Motivated by development, achievement, and ideas rather than material or process-driven incentives. Highly persistent, does not give up easily, and knows how to achieve results. Goal-oriented, thinks in terms of numbers, facts, and figures. Strong project management skills. Highly stress-resistant and able to work in situations of uncertainty and multitasking. English (fluent), Russian (native/fluent). ¬† What we offer: REMOTE OPPORTUNITY ¬†to work full-time; 7 wellness days per year ¬†(time off) that can be used to deal with household issues, to lie down and recover without taking sick leave; Full payment for¬† professional training, international conferences and meetings; Corporate discount for¬† English lessons; ‚Äã Health benefits. ¬†If you are not eligible for Corporate Medical Insurance, the company will compensate up to $1000 gross per year per employee according to the paychecks. This can be spent on self-purchase of health insurance or on doctor‚Äôs fees for yourself and close relatives (spouse, children); ‚Äã Workplace organization. ¬†The company provides all employees with an equipped workplace and all the necessary equipment (table, armchair, wifi, etc.) in the locations where we have offices or co-working. In the other locations, the company provides reimbursement of workplace costs up to $ 1000 gross once every 3 years, according to the paychecks. This money can be spent on the rent of the co-working room, on equipping the working place at home (desk, chair, Internet, etc.) during those 3 years; Internal gamified gratitude system: ¬†receive bonuses from colleagues and exchange them for time off, merch, team building activities, massage certificates, etc.

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ DefiTuna  is a young project in the¬† Solana Network , launched on the mainnet three months ago. The protocol is bringing innovation to Solana, specifically in the Lending market. We provide tools for both lenders and liquidity providers, offering some of the highest lending rates in the blockchain space. We pride ourselves on being at the forefront of innovation. For liquidity providers, we enable farming with leverage to amplify rewards, allowing LPs to take bigger risks. After a very successful launch and experiencing rapid userbase and TVL growth, we're looking to add a senior fullstack developer with a strong focus on frontend to join our team. The protocol's TVL grew by $10M in one month, with several thousand transactions per day. This is a serious challenge for our team and our business. We are looking for a strong candidate who can contribute towards our rapid growth phase currently experienced by our project, implement a wide range of new features, and take the project to the next level . Role requirements: Since we are a small team, you will have lots of responsibility and the role will be demanding. We value team members who show initiative, can feel ownership over the product, and constantly push themselves and everyone around them to greatness. Resume featuring¬† at least 2 commercially deployed projects , developed either as part of a team or independently.¬† Please, send links to your projects in the cover letter! As it‚Äôs a financial application, the role assumes a¬† strong background in mathematics and computer science. 8+ years of experience. Responsibilities: Lead and mentor a team of frontend developers, ensuring best practices and high-quality code. Collaborate closely with the CTO, CEO, and UI/UX designer to align development with business and design goals. Develop and implement new features, optimizing performance and user experience. Proficiency in: JavaScript/TypeScript React Next.js (or a similar framework, e.g., Remix) Mathematics and algorithms Experience with: Writing unit, integration and E2E tests Working with CI systems (e.g., GitHub Actions, CircleCI, or similar) Git Building and scaling backend services Any low-level language like C/C++ or Rust Preferred Qualifications: Experience with solana blockchain

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ About Us Founded in 2012, Centerex is enterprise-scale data integration, analytics, and infrastructure management. Our artificial intelligence technologies have delivered Big Data management and analysis on the petabyte scale for more than 10 years.¬† Our mission is to create business and technology potential by revealing new opportunities every day. Our products Centerex creates dynamic profiles that help consumers and small businesses know more about the people, real estate, businesses, and professionals they interact with. Using proprietary machine-learning technologies, it is able to integrate real-time information changes from any data source and instantly update existing profiles. Established data-driven products include background checks on people, businesses and professionals, with consumer profiling in development. ¬† We are seeking a strategic and results-driven Chief Marketing Officer to lead our digital marketing efforts and drive online growth for our IT company.¬† The ideal candidate will have deep expertise in digital channels, data-driven decision-making, and experience promoting B2B technology solutions or services. You will oversee all aspects of digital marketing, including demand generation, content strategy, SEO/SEM, social media, email marketing, paid advertising, and web analytics.¬† Key Responsibilities: ¬† ¬† ¬† Develop and execute a comprehensive digital marketing strategy aligned with business objectives. Lead digital demand generation efforts to increase leads, pipeline, and revenue. Oversee content marketing strategies (blog, whitepapers, case studies, etc.) tailored for technical buyers. Manage paid media campaigns (Google Ads, LinkedIn, display ads, etc.). Optimize the company website for UX and conversion rate performance. Analyze performance metrics and ROI across all digital channels; present insights to leadership. Direct and manage email marketing campaigns including drip campaigns and lead nurturing. Collaborate with sales, product, and design teams to create unified messaging and campaigns. Stay updated with the latest digital marketing trends, tools, and best practices. Manage digital marketing budget, agencies, tools, and technology stack. Qualifications: ¬† ¬† ¬† Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or related field (MBA a plus). 4+ years of experience in digital marketing, ideally in a B2B IT, SaaS, or tech environment. Proven success in lead generation, account-based marketing (ABM), and sales funnel optimization. Strong understanding of marketing automation tools (e.g., HubSpot, Marketo, Pardot). Experience with web analytics (Google Analytics, GA4), A/B testing, and reporting dashboards. Excellent leadership, project management, and communication skills. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, tech-driven environment. Job Information: full-time employment (remote), GMT +2/+3 time zone US company contract (suitable for Digital nomad visa, Freelance visa) salary paid in US dollars vacations and holidays are provided —Åompensation level will be discussed individually

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ About Transparent Hiring Transparent Hiring changes lives by helping people find jobs and relocate to some of the most developed countries in the world ‚Äî with a focus on Germany. We are an IT recruiting and relocation company helping English-speaking tech professionals land jobs at German companies ‚Äî from global enterprises to fast-growing startups. We support our candidates all the way: from job search and interviews to visa, relocation, and settling in. Our team is fully remote, distributed from Portugal to Kazakhstan, and our HQ is based in Bavaria, Germany. About the Role We‚Äôre looking for a  strategic and creative Senior SMM Manager  with potential to grow into a Team Lead role to develop our presence on Instagram and TikTok. This is not just about making Reels ‚Äî we‚Äôre looking for someone ready to take full ownership of our social media channels, build and execute a content strategy, and grow into a team leadership role in the future. What You‚Äôll Be Doing Develop and execute a content strategy for Instagram and TikTok in Russian and English Create content for our channels (Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn) Produce and edit short videos (Shorts, Reels, TikToks) Monitor current trends and memes, integrate them into content to attract the audience Analyze content performance, adjust the communication plan, prepare reports What We‚Äôre Looking For Proven experience growing and managing Instagram and TikTok accounts Copywriting skills ‚Äî ability to write texts of various complexity and length Excellent literacy and ability to adapt writing style to the company‚Äôs tone of voice Creativity and active idea generation Strong visual culture and deep understanding of current trends Experience with graphic editors (Figma, Canva, and others) Fluent in  English  (B2 level or higher) What We Offer Full-time remote work with flexible hours Salary in EUR Learning & development budget English lessons with a native speaker International, friendly team with a flat structure and open communication A meaningful product ‚Äî we help people change their lives through work and relocation A startup-like atmosphere with the stability of a company that‚Äôs been growing for over 5 years Opportunities to grow together with the company Join Us Want the flexibility of working from anywhere? Want to work with people who love what they do and make a real impact? Join Transparent Hiring as a  Senior SMM Manager  and help professionals worldwide take the next big step in their lives. P.S. Please attach the link to your portfolio to the cover letter

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ Transparent Hiring  is an international company helping IT specialists from Russia and Eastern Europe find jobs and relocate to Germany and Austria. For over 5 years, we've been supporting professionals at every step of their career move ‚Äî from improving their profiles to getting job offers and settling in a new country. Now we're looking for a teammate to join us in this mission and help our clients with their job search: finding the right vacancies, applying to companies, and supporting candidates all the way to their dream job abroad. If you have experience in HR, IT recruitment, career consulting or client support ‚Äî and you're excited to work with people and make a real difference ‚Äî we‚Äôd love to hear from you! Responsibilities Search for IT job openings based on the client's background and preferences Apply to vacancies on behalf of the client across various platforms Communicate with clients in Russian and English, providing updates and guidance Write and edit cover letters tailored to specific job roles Report on the progress of each case and suggest next steps Send outreach messages to potential employers via LinkedIn Solve questions or concerns and make the job search as smooth as possible Requirements Experience in HR, recruiting, client support, or career consulting Native Russian and confident English (B2‚ÄìC1 level) Excellent communication and writing skills Basic understanding of the IT job market (e.g., you know Java is not JavaScript ) Strong research skills and attention to detail Comfortable working with LinkedIn, job boards, Google Docs What we offer Full-time remote work with flexible hours Salary in EUR Learning & development budget English lessons with a native speaker International, friendly team with a flat structure and open communication A meaningful product ‚Äî we help people change their lives through work and relocation A startup-like atmosphere with the stability of a company that‚Äôs been growing for over 5 years Opportunities to grow together with the company Why join us? At Transparent Hiring, you‚Äôll work with purpose ‚Äî supporting real people on their journey to a better future. You‚Äôll be part of a mission-driven international team that values your ideas, encourages your growth, and believes in what we do. Sound like your kind of job? Apply now ‚Äî we can‚Äôt wait to meet you!

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ Dream job for a true gamer!¬† High Ground Games studio  (‚Äã) is looking for a  Junior Game Designer . text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ React Native Engineer ¬† About us: Republic ¬†is a financial technology firm that allows everyone to invest in private markets. Republic operates several distinct business lines including a retail investment platform, a private capital division, and a blockchain advisory practice. The Republic ecosystem has deployed over $900 million in investments, has supported over 600 companies, and comprises a community of over 1.5M users across 100 countries. Republic is backed by dozens of leading investment firms and financial institutions and its affiliated entities have co-invested with the best names in venture and private equity. Founded in 2016, Republic is headquartered in New York City with offices worldwide. Currently we‚Äôre looking for a a skilled  React Native Engineer  to join our cross-functional team working on Republic‚Äôs mobile applications. You will play a key role in building and maintaining high-quality mobile experiences that deliver value to our users. What you‚Äôll do: Develop and maintain cross-platform mobile applications using React Native for iOS and Android. Build and implement user interfaces and components based on designs and wireframes. Integrate with RESTful APIs and third-party services. Optimize performance and troubleshoot application bottlenecks. Participate in code reviews and technical discussions to shape scalable architecture. Collaborate with design, product, and backend teams to ensure alignment and quality. Support and improve CI/CD pipelines for mobile applications. Our perfect match would have: 2+ years of experience building mobile applications with React Native. Strong knowledge of JavaScript and TypeScript. Understanding of mobile application architecture and design patterns. Experience with version control systems like Git. Familiarity with app publishing processes for the App Store and Google Play. Hands-on experience with testing tools such as Jest and Detox. Excellent communication and teamwork skills. Nice to have: Experience with Expo and its ecosystem. Familiarity with native iOS (Swift) or Android (Kotlin) development. Experience migrating existing applications to React Native. Background in building and maintaining mobile SDKs Experience working in distributed and remote-first teams Culture, Values and what you may love working at Republic: Unlimited potential for growth and contributions as Republic constantly keeps growing; Amazing professional environment with lots of opportunities Speak-easy communication and ideas sharing environment Place where your great ideas and contributions are valued and awarded (We have quarterly run Unicorn Award for the best contributors and mid/year and annual reviews) Lack of unnecessary bureaucracy Why to join us? Republic is a place for innovators and visionaries. We empower employees to build what hasn't been built before and support opportunities for growth. Our mission to democratize access to investing, capital raising, and community building is pushed forward by every team, from legal to engineering. Republic is a venture-backed company, we most recently closed a $150M Series B funding led by Valor Equity Partners. ¬† This is a fully remote job opportunity for the candidates ready to work within European working hours and being located outside of Russia and Belarus.

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ About Us Founded in 2012, Centerex is enterprise-scale data integration, analytics, and infrastructure management. What we offer Full remote work for candidates based in the EU; 20% business travel for in-person meetings and events; Flexible start of the workday; Comfortable collaboration within a supportive and professional team; Regular salary reviews to ensure market competitiveness; Competitive compensation and a solid benefits package. We‚Äôre on the hunt for a Lead Developer who will guide technical direction of projects, ensuring coding standards and manage a team. Benefits: Work remotely with a good internet connection ‚Äî our team is 100% remote and distributed all over the world from Brazil, to Montenegro, to USA, to New Zealand, and more. Important:  candidates from Russia and Belarus should relocate after the probation period. Freedom to choose your own working hours ‚Äî We have two "required online ‚Äã‚Äãhours" which are from 8-10 am Pacific Time. Outside of that you are free to work at whatever time of day that you know you are most productive. Competitive salary based on experience level. Profit-Sharing program bonuses based on seniority and ‚Äã‚Äãrole. 22 paid days off annually, with the ability to make up missed days on weekends. We add one more day for each year of employment. Paid parental leave. Your Role: Work in a distributed international development team creating world-leading products for photographers. Lead and mentor a dedicated team of Node.js developers, fostering an environment of growth and innovation. Write reusable, testable, and efficient code that aligns with the best practices. Maintain and evolve the ecosystem of microservices that support client-facing applications. Architect and implement scalable, resilient event-driven systems using Apache Kafka. Develop new GraphQL APIs, and wrap the existing REST APIs. Elevate the backend developer experience by setting the standards for tooling, workflows, and practices that maximize efficiency and satisfaction among the team members. Fun parts of our backend: AI for facial recognition Video rendering, video effects, etc etc Audio analysis with our own algorithms (rhythm, mood, etc) Improving our micro service architecture (gql, kafka + schema registry, postgres, nestjs, maybe RabbitMQ latter), telemetry (traces, metrics, logs with loki, tempo, graphana and victoria metrics; made by us) - lots of opportunities for improvements Qualifications: 5+ years of experience in backend web development 2+ years of experience in leading and mentoring a team of developers Proficiency with JavaScript and TypeScript Expert knowledge of any modern RDBMS Experience leading teams who follow domain-driven design principles Expert knowledge of event-driven architecture patterns (Apache Kafka or other brokers) Experience in driving observability practices for microservices (Grafana, Datadog). Strong knowledge of CI/CD processes (GitLab) Strong knowledge of Kubernetes AWS experience is a plus Python knowledge is a plus NestJS and federated GraphQL experience is a plus Excellent problem-solving skills Dream company is there. Feel free to apply.

text: –û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ Termius  is a modern SSH client built for collaboration and productivity. It organizes infrastructure knowledge and helps troubleshoot incidents quickly to reduce costly downtime. Today, our customers include over 30,000 companies, and millions of engineers use Termius to connect to their remote servers. While AI has transformed modern IDEs, a terminal stays the same inefficient technology since the 1970s. As a leading cross-platform SSH client, our mission is to boost productivity and foster collaboration by rebuilding the Terminal for the modern era. We are actively growing and seeking¬†for a  Senior Frontend Engineers  to complement our team and help us make Termius the primary work instrument for many engineers worldwide in their daily routines. Why Join Termius: Your contributions will directly influence the experience of millions of engineers and shape the future of system management tools. The speed and quality of decision making depend on the accessibility of information. We aim for full transparency in all our actions. We share and ask for the candid feedback needed to become great. We build for system engineers and aim to make complex things feel simple and visually appealing. Be part of a culture that values proactiveness, a fail-fast-learn-fast approach, and a strong sense of ownership. Requirements: At least 5-6 years of frontend development experience. Proficiency with  React ,  Redux ,  Redux-Saga , and  TypeScript . Familiarity with  MUI  framework or similar. Experience with automated testing frameworks and practices. Proven ability to work independently and take full ownership of projects. Passion for product development and enhancing user experience. Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail. Excellent time management and organizational skills. Good communication skills in English (both written and verbal). Optional: Good understanding of  Electron  and  Node.js . Knowledge of  RxJS  and  XState . Experience with configuring  CI/CD pipelines . Knowledge of  WebWorkers,   WASM,  and  IndexedDB . Knowledge of  SSH protocol  and experience with  network engineering . Experience with  AWS . What you will do at Termius: Independently manage all stages of application development, shape requirements and lead engineering projects relating to the desktop and web experiences. Share responsibility for testing, releasing, and maintaining our desktop application and related developer tools and processes. Proactively identify and resolve technical challenges to enhance application performance and user experience. Work closely with product managers, designers, and engineers to influence the product development. Leverage technologies that bring value to our products and company, focusing on solutions that enhance functionality and meet our users' needs and product vision. Communicate with our users to understand their needs, troubleshoot issues, and ensure their success with our platform. What We Offer: We provide employees with the necessary equipment to create a productive work environment. Longevity benefits: paid vacation, sick leaves, and flexible timeoff. A culture that encourages proactiveness, a fail-fast-learn-fast approach, and a sense of ownership. Join Us: If you're an experienced self-sufficient individual contributor passionate about product development and excited to make a significant impact, we'd love to hear from you. Please submit your resume and cover letter detailing your experience and why you're a great fit for this role. You can apply directly through our Lever
